verbs.description: [ARG0: some people] unable to [V: boil] [ARG1: water] [ARGM-TMP: during boil water notice] not everyone impacted by this notice is able to boil water or boil enough water for their families so they are relying on bottled water which was hard to come by at the start of this notice eoc cdc john wang gloria villeda water jimmy johnson austin san antonio texas assistant vice president
